ygData.subject: Re: Armor Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Goss yields an AC of 8, and is magical, yet I don t know what the magic does exactly.  I have one.  I have no idea what you could auction it for because I
ygData.messageBody:
Goss yields an AC of 8, and is magical, yet I don't know what the magic does
exactly. I have one. I have no idea what you could auction it for because
I don't plan to give it up anytime soon.. or at least til I get a Flowing
black robe :)... I would guess, however, you could probably ask 8p-10p+ and
get it. I don't recall what the jr. and sr. app robes went for in the
guild.. that might be a good reference point though. I'm sure there will be
a difference of opinion on this, but thats my take at least :).




-----Original Message-----
From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
To: EverQuest Mailing List <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 20, 1999 11:52 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Armor Question


>From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
>
>I am a 14th Level Wizard and am wondering what robes and armor I should
>be searching for. I have heard that Gossimer Robes are some of the best
>robes, is this true? If so, any idea on how much they fetch at an
>auction?
>
>For other armor pieces, I have heard woven is good. What about Mesh?
>Can Wizards use Mesh or is Woven armor the armor of choice? Again, any
>ideas for prices on woven and/or mesh?
>
>
>Thanks,
>
>
>Soren
>
>
